trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula uma <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ToolboxItemContainer is a simple class that encapsulates a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> for efficiency.
trans-unit.target: ToolboxItemContainer é uma classe simple que encapsula uma <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>para uma eficiência.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: By having a single class that is always loaded, you can defer the loading of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> until it is needed.
trans-unit.target: Por meio de uma única classe que está sempre carregada, pode diferir o carregamento do <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>até que este é necessário.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: Because new classes can be derived from <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>, you could load a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> that could, in turn, load an assembly that is not already in memory.
trans-unit.target: Porque as novas classes podem derivar de <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>, foi possível carregar um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>que pode, por sua vez, a carregar uma assemblagem que já não se encontra na memória.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: For a large collection of <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> objects, this could cause a large number of assemblies to be loaded, which decreases performance.
trans-unit.target: Para uma coleção grande de <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>objetos, pode causar um grande número de assemblagens seja carregado, diminui o desempenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the toolbox service deals only with ToolboxItemContainer objects and retrieves their contained <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> only when necessary.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, o serviço de caixa de ferramentas lida apenas com objetos de ToolboxItemContainer e obtém os respetivos contidos <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>apenas quando necessário.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The ToolboxItemContainer is designed to hold any cached data from the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.
trans-unit.target: O ToolboxItemContainer foi concebido para conter todos os dados em cache de <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation only holds the filter of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>, but deriving classes may choose to cache the name, image, and other information.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida contém apenas o filtro do <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>, mas a efectuar a derivação de classes pode optar por colocar em cache o nome, a imagem e outras informações.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: ToolboxItemContainer objects support two forms of serialization: they can be serialized through standard runtime serialization, and they can also load and save themselves from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Objetos de ToolboxItemContainer suportam duas formas de serialização: pode ser serializados através de serialização de tempo de execução padrão e também pode carregar e guardar si próprios do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The former provides a very easy way to save ToolboxItemContainer objects to a persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: A primeira é uma forma muito fácil para guardar os objetos de ToolboxItemContainer para um armazenamento persistente.

trans-unit.source: The latter provides a way to integrate ToolboxItemContainer objects with mixed data storage formats.
trans-unit.target: A última opção fornece um meio de integrar ToolboxItemContainer objetos com formatos de armazenamento de dados mistos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref> classe a partir de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The container’s cache of information is filled by accessing properties on the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.
trans-unit.target: Cache do contentor de informações é preenchido ao aceder a propriedades no <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> for which to create a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> para o qual pretende criar um <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref> classe a partir de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The `data` parameter may contain data provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: O `data` parâmetro poderá conter dados fornecidos pela <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>

trans-unit.source: It may contain data that can be read by one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> creators that have been supplied by the user.
trans-unit.target: Poderá conter dados que podem ser lido por um do <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>criadores que foram fornecidas pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: It may also be data with a clipboard format that has a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> creator assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser dados com um formato de área de transferência que tenha um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>Criador atribuídos.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> is created on demand.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>é criado a pedido.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: A data object that represents a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de dados que representa um <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref> class from a serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref> classe a partir de uma sequência de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The serialization information passed in by the serializer when deserializing the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As informações de serialização transmitido pelo serializador quando anular a serialização de <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The streaming context passed in by the serializer when deserializing the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de transmissão em fluxo transmitido pelo serializador quando anular a serialização de <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref> instâncias são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref> a comparar com a atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref> é igual a atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref> objects that represent the current filter for the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"> </xref> objetos que representam o filtro atual para o <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The `creators` parameter is a collection of <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator> objects that represent any custom <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> creators that should be included when the filter is generated.
trans-unit.target: O `creators` parâmetro é uma coleção de <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator>objetos que representam qualquer personalizada <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>criadores que devem ser incluídos quando o filtro é gerado.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator>

trans-unit.source: Custom creators may contribute to the filters.
trans-unit.target: Criadores personalizados podem contribuir para os filtros.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro pode ser `null` se nenhum criadores forem necessárias.

trans-unit.source: The types stored in a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> may have a filter associated with them.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos de armazenados num <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>pode ter um filtro associado aos mesmos.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: Filters can be used to restrict the tools that can be placed on designers.
trans-unit.target: Podem ser utilizados filtros para restringir as ferramentas que podem ser colocadas em estruturadores.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação devolve nunca <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves the serialization state for the object.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o estado de serialização para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The serialization information passed in by the serializer when serializing this object.
trans-unit.target: As informações de serialização transmitido pelo serializador quando a serialização deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: The streaming context passed in by the serializer when serializing this object.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de transmissão em fluxo transmitido pelo serializador quando a serialização deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> contained in the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> contidas no <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The `creators` parameter is a collection of <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator> objects that represent any custom <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> creators that should be included when the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> is obtained.
trans-unit.target: O `creators` parâmetro é uma coleção de <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator>objetos que representam qualquer personalizada <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>criadores que devem ser incluídos de quando o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>são obtidas.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator>

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro pode ser `null` se nenhum criadores forem necessárias.

trans-unit.source: The GetToolboxItem method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> that represents the data stored in the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>.
trans-unit.target: O método de GetToolboxItem devolve um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>que representa os dados armazenados no <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: GetToolboxItem never returns `null`, nor does it ever raise an exception, except in extreme cases (for example, out of memory).
trans-unit.target: Nunca devolve GetToolboxItem `null`, nem se alguma vez gerar uma exceção, exceto em casos extremos (por exemplo, memória esgotada).

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> cannot be fabricated, the appropriate exception is embedded within a special <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>não pode ser fabricated, a exceção adequada é incorporada numa oferta especial de <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponents%2A> method on this special <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> is called.
trans-unit.target: A exceção é acionada quando o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponents%2A>método neste especial <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>é chamado.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: This puts the exception at the point of user action.
trans-unit.target: Isto coloca a exceção at the point of ação do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemCreator"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> contained in the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> contidas no <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying toolbox item has been deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o item subjacente foi anulado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the underlying toolbox item has been deserialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item subjacente tem sido anular a serialização; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> contained in the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref> is transient.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um se com indicação de valor de <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> contidas no <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref> é transitório.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> contained in the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref> is marked as transient; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se o <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> contidas no <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref> está marcado como transitório; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer.GetObjectData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição deste membro, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer.GetObjectData*>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer>

trans-unit.source: The serialization information passed in by the serializer when serializing this object.
trans-unit.target: As informações de serialização transmitido pelo serializador quando a serialização deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: The streaming context passed in by the serializer when serializing this object.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de transmissão em fluxo transmitido pelo serializador quando a serialização deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"></xref> that describes this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"> </xref> que descreve esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ToolboxData property creates the serialized version of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ToolboxData cria a versão serializada do <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The data object can be used by an application to store this <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de dados pode ser utilizado por uma aplicação para armazenar esta <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: This data object is fabricated from the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto de dados é fabricated do <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>, se necessário.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"></xref> that describes this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject"> </xref> que descreve esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Merges the container's filter with the filter from the given item.
trans-unit.target: Une o filtro do contentor com o filtro do item fornecido.

trans-unit.source: You should call the UpdateFilter method when the toolbox item is modified or configured.
trans-unit.target: Deve chamar o método de UpdateFilter quando o item é modificado ou configurado.

trans-unit.source: You should also call it if a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>, which the changes the filter, is added.
trans-unit.target: Deve chamar também se a uma nova <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>, que as alterações do filtro é adicionado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>

trans-unit.source: The source of the filter to merge with the container's filter.
trans-unit.target: A origem do filtro para intercalar com o filtro do contentor.
